content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""

However, when I received a command to zip the directory, it failed as the zip command was not found. I then installed zip using the command "sudo apt-get install zip" and it was successful. Recently, I executed the command "zip -r best_ways_to_learn_abroad.zip best_ways_to_learn_abroad" using the execute_shell command. The command returned STDOUT with the files in the directory being added and deflated, and there was no STDERR. Additionally, you sent a command to list files in the current directory using the command "list_files".'}
